meta.title: Get a token
meta.summary: In this step you will get a new access token from console

inputs.value:
These are your steps :

  1. Open OhMyAPI Console and login it if you have an account.
  2. Then click on 'My tokens' card and click on 'create one' button.
  3. Choose an expire date for your access token and get your new access token.
  4. Copy it on your clipboard and paste it any where you want.
